resources.string: Mission Connect aims to facilitate communication between school clubs and make it easier for clubs to communicate with their members. A secondary goal is to make it much easier for schools to manage the club registration process, as we also include an easy way to tabulate club information.\n\n For further information, visit:
Invalid email for this school. Please login with your FUSD GAFE Account.
Firebase authentication failure. Please try again.
Sign In failed. Please try again.
Please select a club from My Clubs with Officer Rank.
Please select an Event Club. Note it is an auto fill text field.
Please select a valid school you want to Register with.
Please note: You cannot change your school once the school is picked at the time of registration.
Pick a school below to show you the most relevant club information at your school.
You are not a part of any clubs! Click Join Clubs for a list of all clubs available at your school.
You are not going to any events! RSVP to any of your club events to have it show up here!
You clubs don\'t have any events in the future! This area will show all of the events from clubs that you have signed up for!
You are not an officer of any clubs! If you would like to propose a new club at our school, please contact ASB and follow the school guidelines for club formation!
This club has no events! If you are an officer of this club please go to Publish tab to add new events!
